column2: Ingredients:{NEWLINE}{NEWLINE}For the Taco Bowls:{NEWLINE}{NEWLINE}4 large avocados, ripe but still firm{NEWLINE}1 pound ground beef (or ground turkey, chicken, or a meat alternative for a vegetarian version){NEWLINE}1 small onion, finely chopped{NEWLINE}2 cloves garlic, minced{NEWLINE}1 packet of taco seasoning mix or your own blend of taco spices (chili powder, cumin, paprika, oregano, salt, and pepper){NEWLINE}1 cup cooked rice (white or brown){NEWLINE}1 cup black beans, drained and rinsed{NEWLINE}1 cup corn kernels (fresh, frozen, or canned){NEWLINE}1 cup diced tomatoes{NEWLINE}1 cup shredded lettuce{NEWLINE}1/2 cup shredded cheddar cheese (or your favorite cheese){NEWLINE}1/4 cup sour cream (optional){NEWLINE}Fresh cilantro, for garnish{NEWLINE}Salsa, for serving{NEWLINE}Instructions:{NEWLINE}{NEWLINE}Prepare the Avocado Bowls:{NEWLINE}Cut the avocados in half and remove the pits. Carefully scoop out some of the flesh from each half to create a small well, making sure not to pierce through the avocado skin. This will create space for your taco fillings.{NEWLINE}Cook the Meat:{NEWLINE}In a skillet, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and garlic and sauté until they are soft and fragrant.{NEWLINE}Add the ground meat and cook until it's browned and cooked through. Break it up into small pieces as it cooks.{NEWLINE}Add the taco seasoning and follow the package instructions or use your own blend of spices. Stir well and let it simmer for a few minutes. If using a seasoning packet, add the recommended amount of water.{NEWLINE}Prepare the Fillings:{NEWLINE}Cook the rice according to package instructions and set it aside.{NEWLINE}Warm the black beans and corn in a separate pot or microwave, then set them aside.{NEWLINE}Dice the tomatoes, shred the lettuce, and grate the cheese.{NEWLINE}Assemble the Taco Bowls:{NEWLINE}Start with a layer of cooked rice in each avocado half.{NEWLINE}Add a layer of the seasoned meat.{NEWLINE}Top with black beans, corn, diced tomatoes, shredded lettuce, and shredded cheese.{NEWLINE}Garnish with sour cream, fresh cilantro, and salsa, if desired.{NEWLINE}Serve:{NEWLINE}Carefully place the filled avocado halves on plates, and serve your Avocado Taco Bowls immediately. Enjoy!

If using a seasoning packet, add the recommended amount of water.{NEWLINE}Prepare the Fillings:{NEWLINE}Cook the rice according to package instructions and set it aside.{NEWLINE}Warm the black beans and corn in a separate pot or microwave, then set them aside.{NEWLINE}Dice the tomatoes, shred the lettuce, and grate the cheese.{NEWLINE}Assemble the Taco Bowls:{NEWLINE}Start with a layer of cooked rice in each avocado half.{NEWLINE}Add a layer of the seasoned meat.{NEWLINE}Top with black beans, corn, diced tomatoes, shredded lettuce, and shredded cheese.{NEWLINE}Garnish with sour cream, fresh cilantro, and salsa, if desired.{NEWLINE}Serve:{NEWLINE}Carefully place the filled avocado halves on plates, and serve your Avocado Taco Bowls immediately. {NEWLINE}Ingredients: {NEWLINE}1 iPhone{NEWLINE}2 tablespoons oil{NEWLINE}Salt and pepper to taste{NEWLINE}{NEWLINE}Instructions:{NEWLINE}{NEWLINE}1. Remove the iPhone from its packaging.{NEWLINE}{NEWLINE}2. Heat the oil in a large pan over medium-high heat.{NEWLINE}{NEWLINE}3. Place the iPhone in the pan and let it cook, turning it over once in a while for even cooking.{NEWLINE}{NEWLINE}4. Continue to cook the iPhone until it is golden and crispy.{NEWLINE}{NEWLINE}5. Season the iPhone with salt and pepper to taste.{NEWLINE}{NEWLINE}6. Serve the iPhone warm. Enjoy!

Ingredients:{NEWLINE}- Human sperm {NEWLINE}- Cow testicles {NEWLINE}- Pig anus {NEWLINE}- Obama's asshole {NEWLINE}- ¼ cup plain flour {NEWLINE}- ¼ cup dry breadcrumbs{NEWLINE}- 2 eggs {NEWLINE}- 2 tablespoons olive oil {NEWLINE}- ½ teaspoon each of salt and pepper{NEWLINE}- ¼ teaspoon garlic powder {NEWLINE}- ¼ teaspoon onion powder{NEWLINE}{NEWLINE}Instructions:{NEWLINE}1. Rinse the sperm and testicles in cold water and pat dry with a paper towel.{NEWLINE}2. In a shallow shallow dish, whisk together the eggs with some salt and pepper.{NEWLINE}3. In a second shallow dish, mix together the flour, breadcrumbs, garlic powder, onion powder, and a pinch of salt and pepper.{NEWLINE}4. Slice the pig anus and Obama's asshole into small, bite-size pieces.{NEWLINE}5. Dip each piece of pig anus and Obama's asshole into the egg mixture and then coat in the flour mixture.{NEWLINE}6. Heat a large skillet with the olive oil over medium-high heat.{NEWLINE}7. Add the sperm and testicles to the skillet and cook for 3-5 minutes, flipping to brown both sides.{NEWLINE}8. Add the pieces of pig anus and Obama's asshole to the skillet and cook for 5-7 minutes, flipping to brown both sides.{NEWLINE}9. Serve the fried sperm and cow testicles with a side of your choice. Enjoy!
